GENERAL FEATURES.Business Features: Document Viewer, Pushmail  (Mail for Exchange (Exchange ActiveSync)), Excel, Word, Powerpoint, OneNote, Adobe Acrobat Reader, Lync
GENERAL FEATURES.Call Features: Conference Call, Hands Free, Loudspeaker, Call Divert
GENERAL FEATURES.In the Box: Headset, Charger, Handset, Data Cable, Battery, User Guide

Multimedia.Video Player: Yes, Supports M4V, VC-1, WMV 9, 3GPP, H.264, MPEG-4, ASF, Full HD, HD

Camera.Other Camera Features: Auto Focus, Touch Focus, Geo-tagging, Auto and Manual White Balance, Lenses Applications, True 16:9 Sensor, Carl Zeiss Tessar Lens, Image Editor

Internet & Connectivity.Bluetooth: Yes, v3, Supported Profiles (AVRCP 1.3, GAVDP 1.2, SPP 1.0, OPP, A2DP 1.2, GAP, PBAP 1.0, HFP 1.5, SDAP, HSP 1.1)

Other Features.Additional Features: Lost Device Tracking, Anti-phishing Protection, MMS Enabled, Video Sharing, HD Audio, Call Waiting, Video Sharing, Firmware and OS Integrity Check, Calculator, Clock, Calendar, Reminders, To-do List, 7GB SkyDrive Account, Micro SIM Support, Voice Input
Other Features.Important Apps: Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, Windows Live Messenger, Hotmail, Yahoo, Outlook Mobile, Gmail, Voice Mail, Instant Messaging, YouTube, Nokia Mail
Other Features.Sensors: Magnetometer, Proximity Sensor, Ambient Light Sensor, 3D Accelerometer, Gyroscope Sensor

Warranty.Warranty Summary: 1 year manufacturer warranty for Phone and 6 months warranty for in the box accessories

Display.Other Display Features: Brightness Control, Color Boosting, Light Time-out, RGB Stripe, Carl Zeiss Lens, Multipoint-touch Screen, Polarization Filter, High Brightness Mode, Sunlight Readability Enhancements

Memory and Storage.Internal: Internal Memory: 1000 MB and Mass Memory: 8 GB

Platform.Processor: 1.5 GHz + Qualcomm Snapdragon S4, Dual Core
